title: Mexico Raises $9 Billion With Three-Part Bond Deal to Begin 2026
description: Mexico raised $9 billion in a sale of dollar bonds on Monday, kicking off the year with its second-largest debt offering on record.
content: Mexico raised $9 billion in a sale of dollar bonds on Monday, kicking off the year with its second-largest debt offering on record.
